Magnetic Nib: Develop a paintbrush with a magnetic nib that can hold paint more efficiently, reducing the amount of paint wasted during application. This can also make it easier to clean the brush after use.

Paintbrush App: Develop a mobile app that allows users to customize their paintbrushes with different types of paint and brushstrokes. The app can also provide tips and techniques for painting different types of surfaces.

Paintbrush with Built-in Camera: Create a paintbrush that has a built-in camera that can capture images of the painting process in real-time. This can be useful for artists who want to document their work as they create it.
Paintbrush with Built-in Light: Develop a paintbrush that has a built-in LED light that can illuminate the painting surface, making it easier to see small details and paint with precision.

Paintbrush with Built-in Timer: Create a paintbrush that has a built-in timer that allows users to set a specific amount of time for painting a particular area. This can help users maintain consistency in their brushstrokes and prevent over-painting.
